item.title: 【BLU-RAY】BDRiP - ZZ Top - Live from Texas [1080p, 5.1 DTS-HD, 5.1 DD, 2.0 LPCM] {MKV}
item.description:
Live from Texas is a live Blu-ray by ZZ Top. It was recorded on November 1, 2007, at the Nokia Theatre in Grand Prairie, Texas, and released on June 24, 2008, by Eagle Rock Records.
Click to expand...


Code:
1. Got Me Under Pressure
2. Waitin' For The Bus
3. Jesus Just Left Chicago
4. I'm Bad, I'm Nationwide
5. Pin Cushion
6. Cheap Sunglasses
7. Pearl Necklace
8. Heard It On The X
9. Just Got Paid
10. Rough Boy
11. Blue Jean Blues
12. Gimme All Your Lovin'
13. Sharp Dressed Man
14. Legs
15. Tube Snake Boogie
16. La Grange
17. Tush

Bonus Features:
18. Poker Game
19. Dallas Show Day
20. Photo Shoot
21. Foxey Lady
This is the full Bluray ripped to MKV files.
The Audio is available as 5.1 DTS-HD Surround, 5.1 DD Surround and 2.0 LPCM Stereo Sound.
The Scans of the Booklet are not very good, sorry for that :/
